Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Aphid BCR8 (bacteriocyte-specific cyeteine-rich peptide 8; natural AMPs; insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; 3S=S, UCSS1a; BBMm)

Literature.Author: Uchi N, Fukudome M, Nozaki N, Suzuki M, Osuki KI, Shigenobu S, Uchiumi T.2019
Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Activities of Cysteine-rich Peptides Specific to Bacteriocytes of the Pea Aphid Acyrthosiphon pisum.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (33.33%) toNCR247GRAVY: -0.17; mol wt: 6534.557; Mol formula: C283H432N71O87S9; Mol ex Coeff: 11947.5 (Cys paired).Activity: Active against E. coli MG1655 (MIC 5 uM).
